oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New Orleans - Port
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "State of Louisiana Board of Commissioners of the Port of New Orleans." Color image.

Typed: "Public Cotton Warehouses & Terminal of the Board of Commissioners of the Port of New Orleans -- Owned and operated by State of Louisiana through the Board of Commissioners of the Port of New Orleans. Cost $3,500,000.00. Capacity 425,000 Bales of Cotton. Largest and most complete Cotton handling and storage in the World." -- "'Get the Habit' Eat Brer Rabbit Syrups and Molasses."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: New Orleans, Louisiana; cotton; ports; warehouses; Mississippi River;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: C.T. American Art; Collection processed by Angela Price; digitized by S. Frierson;
